ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We are especially grateful to the people of the Din Kao, Mae Tum, Ho, and Kok Noi villages for generous help and for sharing their knowledge about the use of wild leafy vegetables. We are also grateful to the staff of Ethnobotany and Northern Thai Flora, Department of Biology, Chiang Mai University, for assistance and facilities during the field survey. We also thank valuable comments from reviewers, which helped improve the quality of the manuscript.
